quotes.quote: That sun, that light had faded, and she had faded with them. Now she was as grey as the season itself.
Some people seem to fade away but then when they are truly gone, it's like they didn't fade away at all.
I feel half faded away like some figure in the background of an old picture.

Faded the flower and all its budded charms, Faded the sight of beauty from my eyes, Faded the shape of beauty from my arms, Faded the voice, warmth, whiteness, paradise – Vanish’d unseasonably at shut of eve...
Faded smiles oft linger in the face, While grief's first flakes fall silent on the heart!
The older we get, the swifter time seems to pass and the quicker memories seem to fade.
Faded way too long, I'm floatin in and out of consciousness
Piece by piece, I slowly fade away, I slowly drift apart
You want it or not but with time, memories are going to fade. Wounds will be healed and life will give you plenty opportunities to be happy.
It's better to burn out, than to fade away.
I'd keep your beauty timeless. like a flower pressed in a book, yes I wouldn't let it fade, Folded in the chapters of my mind.
The moon is not full anymore. As it also started fading in the Darkness just like me.
The apple of my eye, had turned into an empty core.
Memories were fine but you couldn't touch them, smell them or hold them. They were never exactly as the moment was, and they faded with time.
Love is all wasted, till it is not tested. Love is all faded, if it is only tested.
Memories have no life. They're just pale reminders of a time that's gone-like faded photographs.
When the light has sharply faded And you have lost your way Let another's love guide you It can turn blackest night into day.
You will never age for me, nor fade, nor die.
Life’s a harrowing echo only to be faded into exiled loneliness.
You always have to believe in yourself and not let your confidence fade.
Politicians never fade away; they just keep carrying on, you know, their class.
